arguments.description: The array in which to search for the item
arguments.name: haystack

arguments.description: The item that we are looking for in the array
arguments.name: needle

arguments.description: If set to true then if a then a substring match will also return true. This will only work with simple values. Passing true with complex objects will throw an exception.
arguments.name: substringMatch

description: Returns the position of the first element in the array that matches the item that we are searching for, or 0 if the item is not found.
name: arraycontains
